value:
I am not meant for festivals like this.
...Why did you bring me here?

Dökkálfheimr is an abyss of despair,
full of the fragments of nightmares...

Changing my attire will not make the
nightmares end. But you know that,
don't you?

While there are some things that
appear in spring, others vanish...
They simply fade away, unnoticed.

The end of winter is like waking from
a long nightmare... It is when people
feel most alive.

I am Triandra, bringer of nightmares.
A dream of spring now drifts over
$Nf's halls.

Perhaps this is why spring is
so beloved...

Embrace the season's warmth,
and drift off to sleep...

I was carried away by the season's
many distractions...
For...me? Hm. Thank you.

I am a dökkálfr of Dökkálfheimr,
Triandra, the Nightmare. You expect
me to attend...a spring festival?

Birds chirping, sun shining through
the rain, shared laughter...$k$pThese things do not exist
in Dökkálfheimr. I have no
connection to any of this.$k$pIt is strange that it still somehow feels
so familiar to me...$k$pPerhaps I knew this warmth once
long ago...$k$pNow, however, I am one with
only nightmare...$k$pThis festival is my nightmare now.
But, for her...this world's warmth
is a dear thing, so I will suffer it.
Spring stirs.
Spring stirs.
Still asleep?
Still asleep?
Bunny...attack.
...Hop.
Back...to sleep...
What were you thinking, inviting someone like me to a festival like this?
*gasp* Do not...do that.
Those consumed by nightmare long to finally wake.
You think I'm...cute? Surely you mean the outfit.
Colorful blossoms, a warm breeze... Nothing like Dökkálfheimr.
Bunnies are...so small, so fluffy. They always made her happy...
Why attend to me like this? I cannot understand you.
Right.
Hmm...
Hop, hop.
